text: Ga re leke go gogela batho ka boferefere mo go dumeleng, ga re na kgatlhego mo go tsietseng ope. Ga re ke re leka go gapa ope go dumela gore Baebele e ruta se e sa se ruteng. Ditsela tsotlhe tseo tsa matlhabisa ditlhong re di baketse. Re ema fa pele ga Modimo jaaka re bua mme jalo re bolele boammaaruri, jaaka botlhe ba re itseng ba tlaa dumela.
